document.full_text: a close friend of late writer stieg larsson, the man behind the best-selling millennium series, has revealed details of the unpublished manuscript thought to be the fourth book in the crime saga.
document.title: fourth "millennium" novel set in canada: report
lines_and_colors: a close friend of late writer stieg larsson, the man behind the best-selling millennium series, has revealed details of the unpublished manuscript thought to be the fourth book in the crime saga.
